Posts.Content: I a'm 49 years women, I recently got mastectemy done for my right breast ,5 years back i had lumpactatmy done on my left breast,my patology resultsare---my lymph nodes are clear,it was multiple dcis,her2/nu protein overexpression:positive,and .7mm invasive, dr. is suggesting to do cemo for 4 months then radiation and tamoxifen and herceptin,ia'm so scared of the side effects although there is nothing in lymph nodes then why they are giving cemo can't i just take radiation and tamoxifen,i have been doing yoga and breathing exersices won't that will help me,if i donot take cemo and cary on with yoga and temoxifen will it help,anybody has any answers for me as i have to decide in 3/4 days, please reply. thanks
Posts.Title: cemotheropy or pills
